actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the complexity of Federal income tax forms.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Internal Revenue Service and the Congress should take action to simplify the Federal income tax forms. Calls upon the States and local governments which impose income taxes to model their forms upon the Federal income tax forms.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the complexity of Federal income tax forms.
